briefdescription.para: Animates an input string to scroll over time within another fixed size string.

detaileddescription.para: If the source string is shorter than the destination, no animation is done. Else, the source string padded with 4 spaces is scrolled with wrap-around based on clock().

briefdescription.para: Sleeps until clock() ticks a given amount of time.
Used during audio processing, which is slow, to draw a progress bar in the bottom right.

parameterdescription.para: A double from 0.0 to 1.0 representing the current progress.

briefdescription.para: The main file implements the application logic of KayEQ, passing data between the other modules.
